casebody.data:
State
v.
John Thomas Patterson, Jr. 424P15-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Patterson, John Thomas (Jr.). Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of December 2015 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal and Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
